overview:
Shawn Gardner is the current founder of Fun2Rent.com

A powersport enthusiast, multidisciplinary leader, worked in local govt., now his passion leads him to change consumerism and the current rental market for the boat and powersports industries.

Shawn credits his passion to develop Fun2Rent.com ( Peer To Peer Recreation & Powersport Rentals) from an earlier experience in trying to rent a snowmobile in Lake Tahoe, CA. Shawn went into a local rental company with excitement to rent a snowmobile for the day at a price of $325 for the day. The problem came when he asked about insurance, answer was no rental insurance. He thought three things were wrong, one high price for a 8 hour rental, second no insurance, and third the rental process was old fashioned. Shawn did not rent the snowmobile that day instead he focused his efforts in changing the rental market.

Shawn Gardner in Forbes.com: http://www.forbes.com/sites/actiontrumpseverything/2012/09/22/how-the-best-entrepreneurs-succeed-a-case-study/2/
